
{{alias}}()
    Returns an accumulator function which incrementally computes a maximum
    value.

    The accumulator function returns an updated maximum value if provided a
    value. If not provided a value, the accumulator function returns the current
    maximum value.

    Input values are not type checked. If non-numeric inputs are possible, you
    are advised to type check and handle accordingly before passing the value
    to the accumulator function.

    Returns
    -------
    acc: Function
        Accumulator function.

    Examples
    --------
    > var accumulator = {{alias}}();
    > var maximum = accumulator()
    null
    > maximum = accumulator( 3.14 )
    3.14
    > maximum = accumulator( -5.0 )
    3.14
    > maximum = accumulator( 10.1 )
    10.1
    > maximum = accumulator()
    10.1

    See Also
    --------
